deploy-with-foundry.title: Deploying a smart contract using Foundry
deploy-with-foundry.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy a smart contract on the Base test network using Foundry. Includes instructions for setting up the environment, compiling, and deploying the smart contract.
deploy-with-foundry.author: neodaoist

deploy-with-hardhat.title: Deploying a smart contract using Hardhat
deploy-with-hardhat.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy a smart contract on the Base test network using Hardhat. Includes instructions for setting up the environment, compiling, and deploying the smart contract.
deploy-with-hardhat.author: taycaldwell

deploy-with-remix.title: Deploying a smart contract using Remix
deploy-with-remix.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy a smart contract on the Base test network using Remix IDE. Includes instructions for setting up the environment, compiling, and deploying the smart contract.
deploy-with-remix.author: briandoyle81

deploy-with-tenderly.title: Deploying a smart contract using Tenderly
deploy-with-tenderly.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy smart contracts using Tenderly DevNets. This page covers setup, debugging, transaction simulations, and continuous integration for smart contract development on Base Network.
deploy-with-tenderly.author: tenderly

deploy-with-thirdweb.title: Deploying a smart contract using thirdweb
deploy-with-thirdweb.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy and interact with smart contracts using the thirdweb CLI and SDK. Includes instructions for project creation, contract deployment on the Base test network.
deploy-with-thirdweb.author: taycaldwell

run-a-base-node.title: Running a Base Node
run-a-base-node.description: A tutorial that teaches how to set up and run a Base Node.
run-a-base-node.author: taycaldwell

build-with-thirdweb.title: Building an onchain app using thirdweb
build-with-thirdweb.description: A tutorial that teaches how to build an NFT gallery app using thirdweb, including steps for creating an NFT collection, minting NFTs, and configuring the app for the Base testnet.
build-with-thirdweb.author: taycaldwell

account-abstraction-with-biconomy.title: Account Abstraction on Base using Biconomy
account-abstraction-with-biconomy.description: A tutorial that teaches how to implement Account Abstraction into a Base project using Biconomy paymasters, bundlers, and smart accounts.
account-abstraction-with-biconomy.author: taycaldwell

account-abstraction-with-particle-networ.title: Account Abstraction on Base using Particle Network
account-abstraction-with-particle-networ.description: A walkthrough on Particle Network's Modular Smart Wallet-as-a-Service, leveraging account abstraction and social logins across various providers.
account-abstraction-with-particle-networ.author: TABASCOatw

account-abstraction-with-privy-and-base-.title: Account Abstraction on Base using Privy and the Base Paymaster
account-abstraction-with-privy-and-base-.description: A tutorial that teaches how to implement Account Abstraction into a Base project using Privy and the Base paymaster.
account-abstraction-with-privy-and-base-.author: Brian Doyle and Aaron Hayslip

cross-chain-with-ccip.title: Sending messages and tokens from Base to other chains using Chainlink CCIP
cross-chain-with-ccip.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use Chainlink CCIP to perform cross-chain messaging and token transfers from Base Goerli testnet to Optimism Goerli testnet.
cross-chain-with-ccip.author: taycaldwell

cross-chain-with-layerzero.title: Sending messages from Base to other chains using LayerZero V2
cross-chain-with-layerzero.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use LayerZero V2 to perform cross-chain messaging from Base Goerli testnet to Optimism Goerli testnet.
cross-chain-with-layerzero.author: taycaldwell

complex-onchain-nfts.title: Building onchain NFTs
complex-onchain-nfts.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make complex nfts that are procedurally generated and have onchain metadata and images.
complex-onchain-nfts.author: briandoyle81

oracles-chainlink-price-feeds.title: Accessing real-world data using Chainlink Data Feeds
oracles-chainlink-price-feeds.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use Chainlink Data Feeds to access real-world data, such as asset prices, directly from your smart contracts on the Base testnet.
oracles-chainlink-price-feeds.author: taycaldwell

oracles-pyth-price-feeds.title: Accessing real-time asset data using Pyth Price Feeds
oracles-pyth-price-feeds.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use Pyth Price Feeds to access real-time asset data, directly from your smart contracts on the Base testnet.
oracles-pyth-price-feeds.author: taycaldwell

oracles-supra-vrf.title: Generating random numbers contracts using Supra dVRF
oracles-supra-vrf.description: A tutorial that teaches how to use Supra dVRF to serve random numbers using an onchain randomness generation mechanism directly within your smart contracts on the Base testnet.
oracles-supra-vrf.author: taycaldwell

farcaster-frames-deploy-to-vercel.title: Farcaster Frames: Deploying to Vercel
farcaster-frames-deploy-to-vercel.description: A tutorial that teaches how to deploy a Farcaster Frame using Vercel.
farcaster-frames-deploy-to-vercel.author: briandoyle81

farcaster-frames-gating-and-redirects.title: Farcaster Frames: Gating content and creating redirects
farcaster-frames-gating-and-redirects.description: A tutorial that teaches how to create Frames with more advanced behaviors such as gating content based on a user's follows, likes, or recasts, and creating redirect buttons.
farcaster-frames-gating-and-redirects.author: briandoyle81

farcaster-frames-hyperframes.title: Farcaster Frames: Building HyperFrames
farcaster-frames-hyperframes.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make cross-linked hyperframes in an organized manner.
farcaster-frames-hyperframes.author: briandoyle81

farcaster-frames-nft-minting.title: Farcaster Frames: Building an NFT airdrop Frame
farcaster-frames-nft-minting.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make a Farcaster Frame that allows you to mint and airdrop NFTs to users.
farcaster-frames-nft-minting.author: briandoyle81

farcaster-frames-nocode-minting.title: Farcaster Frames: Building a no-code minting Frame
farcaster-frames-nocode-minting.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make a Farcaster Frame with an outbound link to an NFT minting website.
farcaster-frames-nocode-minting.author: briandoyle81

farcaster-frames-transactions.title: Farcaster Frames: Making transactions
farcaster-frames-transactions.description: A tutorial that teaches how to invoke a wallet transaction from a Farcaster Frame.
farcaster-frames-transactions.author: briandoyle81

hardhat-debugging.title: Hardhat: Debugging smart contracts
hardhat-debugging.description: A tutorial that teaches how to debug your smart contracts using Hardhat.
hardhat-debugging.author: Edson Alcala

hardhat-profiling-gas.title: Hardhat: Optimizing the gas usage of smart contracts
hardhat-profiling-gas.description: A tutorial that teaches how to optimize the gas usage of your smart contracts using Hardhat.
hardhat-profiling-gas.author: Edson Alcala and Brian Doyle

hardhat-profiling-size.title: Hardhat: Optimizing the size of smart contracts
hardhat-profiling-size.description: A tutorial that teaches how to optimize the size of your smart contracts using Hardhat.
hardhat-profiling-size.author: Edson Alcala and Brian Doyle

hardhat-test-coverage.title: Hardhat: Analyzing the test coverage of smart contracts
hardhat-test-coverage.description: A tutorial that teaches how to profile the test coverage of your smart contracts using Hardhat and the Solidity Coverage plugin.
hardhat-test-coverage.author: Edson Alcala

intro-to-foundry-setup.title: Foundry: Setting up Foundry with Base
intro-to-foundry-setup.description: A tutorial that teaches how to set up your development environment to work with Foundry.
intro-to-foundry-setup.author: Edson Alcala

intro-to-foundry-testing.title: Foundry: Testing smart contracts
intro-to-foundry-testing.author: Edson Alcala
intro-to-foundry-testing.description: A tutorial that teaches how to test your smart contracts using Foundry.

intro-to-providers.title: Introduction to Providers
intro-to-providers.description: A tutorial that teaches what providers are, why you need one, and how to configure several providers and use them to connect to the blockchain.
intro-to-providers.author: briandoyle81

farcaster-cast-actions-simple.title: Farcaster Cast Actions: Create a Simple Cast Action
farcaster-cast-actions-simple.description: A tutorial that teaches how to make a simple Farcaster cast action.
farcaster-cast-actions-simple.author: briandoyle81
